Trade/Device Name(s): TD-4277 BLOOD GLUCOSE MONITORING SYSTEM MODEL TD-4277
Instrument(s)/Platform(s): TD-4277 BLOOD GLUCOSE MONITORING SYSTEM MODEL TD-4277
Document Summary: FDA 510(k) summary for TD-4277 Blood Glucose Monitoring System, an electrochemical glucose meter using glucose dehydrogenase for quantitative blood glucose measurement
Indications for Use Summary: Intended for quantitative measurement of glucose in fresh capillary whole blood from the finger for home and professional use as an aid in diabetes control monitoring; not for diagnosis or neonatal use
